I am an Associate Professor in Biostatistics and the Head of the [Centre for Health Informatics, Computing, and Statistics](https://chicas.lancaster-university.uk/) at Lancaster University. My research focuses on developing statistical methodologies motivated by and applied to challenges in population health, with a particular emphasis on tropical disease mapping.

My full CV can be accessed [here](CV_EGiorgi.pdf).
